name: Elamachain
description: Elamachain has established corporations such as Elamachain Foundation LTD. in Singapore where generally manages cryptocurrency business and Elamachain USA for R&D. Starting as a BlockChain & AI development project team in 2017, it embarked upon new business as an official corporation in 2018 and still worked on global projects with its competence, especially focusing on China, Britain and the United States. In 2018, it collaborated with Xanadu Big Data in Boston, U.S. where cooperated with MIT on AI and Big Data and completed its own blockchain main net development with AI. Recently, it received Technical Audit from QuillHash which is a blockchain company and discovered bugs and worked on debugging. Elamachainâ€™s Permissioned blockchain consists of blockchain core network by adding chain-code by Hyperledger Fabric of IBM as well as self-developed coin layer. Also, Elamachain successfully built up internal network for two-way communication and also, external network to communicate with DAPP in order to complete entire main network. In addition, it has developed algorithm and design to solve problems in high-speed transaction of blockchain and tremendously increase transmission speed. Furthermore, Elamachain in Boston is planning to provide AI Chatbot service to sell products and serve customers with local partners in Boston where specialize in AI and Big Data analysis system. Currently, it has developed system semiconductor exclusively for blockchain algorithm, data operation and processing with TAEJIN INFOTECH in order to optimize both software and hardware and made ceaseless efforts to build up environment for the best performance of blockchain. Therefore, it aims to offer blockchain service for corporates and various application as well such as crypto-currency payment system for real life and e-commerce. It has focused on developing specialized competency by providing and developing AI, blockchain technology for B2B market and prepared for different business using platform based on main net with partners. Elamachain is a prominent pioneer where discovers first technology to integrate AI, Blockchain and Big Data. And develops high-speed server based on new generation blockchain, AI and system semiconductor to realize social value and take the lead in the Industry 4.0 era."
